sentence: Hours after the Biden administration announced measures to make “ghost guns” — home-assembled firearms without serial numbers — harder for felons to access, Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro told media he was prepared to handle legal challenges to the ruling.
author: Jesse Bunch
title: AG Josh Shapiro says he'll fight challenges to Biden's crackdown on ghost guns

sentence: Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who was attending Monday’s event at the White House, applauded the move and pointed to a serious uptick in ghost guns being found by police.
author: The Associated Press
title: Biden to nominate new ATF director, release ghost gun rule

sentence: Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who was attending Monday's event at the White House, applauded the move and pointed to a serious uptick in ghost guns being found by police.
author: MICHAEL BALSAMO and ZEKE MILLER Associated Press
title: Biden aims at 'ghost gun' violence with new federal rule

sentence: Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro was at the Rose Garden ceremony, applauding the president’s restrictions on homemade firearms.
author: Cam Edwards
title: GOA explains what the left gets wrong on "ghost guns"
